nodes.text: The New Spy (French: Le Nouvel Espion) is the first installment in the Star Wars Resistance chapter books series, a series of French language junior novels written by Vanessa Rubio-Barreau that adapt episodes of Star Wars Resistance Season One. The New Spy was published by Hachette Jeunesse on January 16, 2019 and adapts the Star Wars Resistance episode "The Recruit".

During a high-risk mission, Kazuda Xiono, a talented young pilot, is spotted by Commander Poe Dameron, who offers him to join the Resistance. But the boy does not really have the profile of a spy: he goes on being clumsy, until he has to participate against his will in a dangerous race of speed… Will he succeed in meeting the challenge?
